name: Bench Press
description: Lie on a bench, lower the bar to your chest, then press it up.

name: Squat
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width, lower your body as if sitting back into a chair, then stand up.

name: Deadlift
description: Stand with feet hip-width, bend at hips and knees to grip the bar, then lift by extending hips and knees.

name: Pull-up
description: Hang from a bar with palms facing away, pull your body up until chin is over the bar.

name: Push-up
description: Start in plank position, lower your body until chest nearly touches the floor, then push back up.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one leg, lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees, then push back to start.

name: Overhead Press
description: Stand with feet shoulder-width, press the weight overhead from shoulder height.

name: Bicep Curl
description: Stand with dumbbells in hands, curl the weights up to shoulders, then lower.

name: Tricep Dips
description: Sit on the edge of a bench, lower your body by bending elbows, then push back up.

name: Plank
description: Hold a forearm plank position, keeping body straight for time.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, twist torso side to side.

name: Burpees
description: From standing, squat down, kick feet back to plank, do a push-up, jump feet forward, then jump up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: In plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest quickly.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Jump while spreading legs and raising arms overhead, then return to start.

name: Calf Raises
description: Stand on toes, raise heels as high as possible, then lower.
